zeroCase.title: Upload, connect, or create your first dataset
zeroCase.description: Bring your location data to CARTO so that you can visualise it and start predicting key insights. Learn about importing your data here.

emptyCase.onlyShared: There are no datasets here. Check out the datasets shared with you.

zeroCase.title: Create your first map to predict key insights
zeroCase.description: Build your first Location Intelligence app and start predicting key insights from your location data with our drag and drop tool for analysts and business users. Learn about Builder here.

emptyCase.onlyShared: There are no maps here. Check out the maps shared with you.

SolutionsPage.solutionsDescription: Consolidating your site network? Need to reduce fleet costs? Redesigning your sales territories? Answer your question through the lens of location.
SolutionsPage.talkUsDescription: Our account management team will give you a firsthand view and discuss with you how we can help your organization to do the same.

sitePlanning.title: Site Planning
sitePlanning.description: Drive site selection and investment decisions with always-on data streams, enabling more accurate revenue prediction and reduced risk of failed location decisions.

territoryManagement.title: Territory Management
territoryManagement.description: Design and align sales and service territories to increase productivity and reduce costs using spatial field operations data.

logisticsOptimization.title: Logistics Optimization
logisticsOptimization.description: Harness the power of geospatial to optimize your Supply Chain, enabling a smarter, more efficient operation.

HelpCenter.title: Help Center
HelpCenter.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions, guides and tutorials about working with data, making Builder maps, managing your account, etc.

DeveloperCenter.title: Developer Center
DeveloperCenter.description: Learn everything you need to know to build the next generation of Location Intelligence applications with the CARTO platform.

GISStackExchange.title: GIS StackExchange
GISStackExchange.description: Explore and share your CARTO-related questions with the GIS StackExchange Community.

TechSupport.title: Tech Support
TechSupport.description: Found a bug or technical issue? Contact our support team and let us know about it.

DedicatedSupport.title: Dedicated Support
DedicatedSupport.description: Contact our dedicated support team and let us know how we can help you.

OrganizationAdmin.title: Your organization's administrator
OrganizationAdmin.description: Contact the administrator of your organization if you have issues regarding your account, quotas, etc.
